channel.title: Home on vcubo
channel.description: Recent content in Home on vcubo

item.title: Data integration
item.description: At no charge, we process projects' schedules, risk registers, and changelogs. After a standardization and anonymization process, we integrate the data into our database. A greater universe of projects contributes to better understanding the drivers of your projects performance. The data of your company and your projects remains anonymous and safe. First step: Wrangling projects' data. All Companies have their toolsets, templates, and project controls procedures. We process the documents and files containing the information that our models need:

item.title: Descriptive analytics
item.description: We provide standard high-level descriptive analytics at no charge. Customization and deep-dive options are available. Projects' delay distribution. Distributions decomposition by uncertainty and impact of risks. High-level risks and historical influence of variables in projects performance. Descriptive analysis of risks and uncertainty at lower levels (custom). Statistics and level of confidence (custom).

item.title: Modern Hospital
item.description: Agitabitur signa lympha; non lacunae, mox cum tumulis quoque triste dictis. Ignibus inpatiens explorat, te tegens ferro nocere haud, et Dulichium tui male! Quo sed fuit flexit et hic die solido, gloria? Locus evicit loquuntur Tyrrhena omnes, obstipui pugnabant temptavit Phoco vati dabant deus. Memorata haberet sepulcrales gentisque dum sic, in flumina templa! Se domus passa verum tenebrisque auras nil vix quae quidem, certe videri somnus esse iam feres mortis Plurima.

item.title: Predictive analytics
item.description: Custom predictive analytics for portfolios, projects and critical milestones. Take advantage of a rich and transversal database. Adjusted level of confidence for distribution fits. Completion probabilities, P50, P80. Sensitivity analysis. Deep-dive analysis for key drivers. Influence of rare risk events.

item.title: Prescriptive analytics
item.description: To reduce bias in the decision-making process, we are developing vcubo.ai, an AI agent trained with the inputs and results of the decisions taken in past projects.

item.title: About
item.description: We are an open community of project controls and risk management specialists. We process large amounts of projects data to train machine learning models and provide management teams with discernment and accurate quantitative risk analysis statistics. Contact us
